text: Support have come back and say that a closed won reason needs setting when closed won for it to appear in the Campaign reporting. Just validating this now.

Good morning! We're running into an issue where a form on a non-standard LP. We're submitting the form via ajax per the V3 api and it isn't carrying over the proper info to categorize the resulting contact source, marking it as organic every time. I'm not sure how to pass the UTM or gClid along to solve this. Is it as simple as parsing it and stuffing it into a field? Thanks!
- <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3>

That is interesting, I was literally about to post a very similar question :sweat_smile: however, our original source values are always resulting in *Direct Traffic* even though, we are definitely grabbing the *hutk* cookie and passing it to the API
Doing the same, I'm grabbing the cookie as well and sending it through. So odd, glad I'm not the only one!

Its definitely an odd one - we must've been through every single *hutk cookie* related developer forum post over here and none of the solutions have worked for us unfortunately - still always coming through as *Direct traffic*
We've now validated that this was the issue and is now resolved. Thanks for your help <@UFBNA9K9A> and hope you've had a good day off!
Any luck? It's been a ghost town in the channel. I'll ping back if we find a solution
Hey <@UH52DMK3Q> thanks for the update. I’m gonna take this down as feedback because I think there is an opportunity for us to make that much clearer.
Thanks - agree that it would be great if the API returned an error in this case. Either way, appreciate your help.

Hey <@UBJG85Z7V> and <@UHNBCT0Q1> would you mind sharing the JSON you are sending with the forms call so I can see what might be going on? Feel free to DM me if there is information you don’t want to share here
